/thruputs

Tag element float

Use float() to float an element to the left or right side of its parent element. A classic example using floats is a newspaper layout where text is wrapped around a picture.

.tag

A tag element.

side

A [responsive] argument. One of "left" or "right" specifying the side to float the element.

Newspaper layout

Fusce commodo. Nullam tempus. Nunc rutrum turpis sed pede. Phasellus lacus. Cras placerat accumsan nulla. Fusce sagittis, libero non molestie mollis, magna orci ultrices dolor, at vulputate neque nulla lacinia eros.

Nulla facilisis, risus a rhoncus fermentum, tellus tellus lacinia purus, et dictum nunc justo sit amet elit.

Proin neque massa, cursus ut, gravida ut, lobortis eget, lacus. Aliquam posuere. Sed id ligula quis est convallis tempor.
